label: const(1)
description:
Returns a constant number.
Takes 1 argument: a literal value entered by the user.

label: player.get_health()
description:
Returns the player's current health as a number.
Takes no arguments.

label: add([], [])
description:
Adds two numbers and returns the result.
Takes 2 arguments: (a, b).

label: target.take_damage([])
description:
Damages the enemy by the given amount.
Takes 1 argument: a number.

label: player.heal([])
description:
Heals the player by a specified amount.
Takes 1 argument: a number.
